questions.question: Which database is a NoSQL database type that can quickly store and retrieve key-value pairs?

You have a large amount of files on your network-attached storage array that must be archived and maintained for a period of 10 years due to industry regulations. This data will be infrequently accessed but must be kept What is the best AWS service for storing this data?
Which Elastic Load Balancing option supports Lambda as a target?

options.value: Lambda can not be called directly by incoming web requests. You must use API Gateway.

sidebar.name: general-aptitude
sidebar.title: General Aptitude
sidebar.description: General aptitude assesses your overall cognitive abilities and problem-solving skills across different subjects and situations, often used in education and employment to gauge adaptability and potential for success.

assessments.name: verbal-reasoning
assessments.title: Verbal Reasoning
assessments.description: Verbal reasoning involves the ability to understand and analyze information presented in written form. It encompasses skills such as comprehension, critical thinking, and logical reasoning applied to written passages, statements, or arguments.

assessments.name: spatial-reasoning
assessments.title: Spatial Reasoning
assessments.description: Spatial reasoning is the ability to understand and manipulate visual information in one's mind's eye. It involves perceiving, analyzing, and mentally rotating shapes, images, and objects in three-dimensional space.

assessments.name: abstract-reasoning
assessments.title: Abstract Reasoning
assessments.description: Abstract reasoning involves the ability to recognize patterns, infer relationships, and solve problems based on non-verbal and non-numeric information. It focuses on understanding concepts and relationships rather than specific details.
